CustomField.description: Pulls in the Conga template IDs used to generate the countersigned version of SSF contracts. Needed because lookupfields can't be referenced in buttons.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Pulls in the Conga template IDs used to generate the countersigned version of SSF contracts. Needed because lookupfields can't be referenced in buttons.
CustomField.label: Conga Contract Id
